entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rimouski
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:05 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
